ChangeLogs.Description:
Details dialog website link re-arranged (Cratis)
Add a language selector to the application options (Cratis)

The show/hide column popup can now be localized

Update Russian local (Medok)
Update Italian locale (Bito)

Hide the update button when the version has not changed

Fix an issue with sorting by updated at after updating an addon
Fix 'Get Addons' download count not showing for less than 1000 downloads
Fix an issue with sorting 'My Addons' by status column
Fix an issue with the cursor not changing on raised buttons.

Update RU locales (Medok)
Update German locales (Glow)

Linux support fixes
Performance fixes for the details dialog

Add the ability to translate plurals (Chops)
Add the alpha/beta indicator for user's default install channel to the 'Get Addons' tab (Chops)
Add new column to show the last updated time of an Addon (Linaori)
Add support for installing vir URL from CurseForge
Show the release date in a more user friendly way (Chops)
More text items are now translated with updated locales (Linaori)
New placehold thumbnail for Addons
Addon author list now limited to 3 rows
Switch to a new analytics provider.
Fix issue with addon count not changing when deleting an addon.
Several fixes for linux support

Attempt to lower background CPU usage to 0
Add translation logic for download counts (flippey)
More locale updates
Install from URL now supports WowInterface download links
Update issues with details dialog.
Fix an issue with WoW install locations not showing up correctly on first run (chops)
Fix an issue with downloads folder not being created
Fix website link on About page to show the cursor
Fix an issue where the details panel would change if another addon was updating.
Fix an issue where an addon row would duplicate with the details dialog open.

UI Updates to details popup (Flippey).
Locale updates. (Oleksandr, McBurn, Morten)
Add a hardware acceleration toggle (Linaori).
Add 'Released At' column to 'My Addons' page. (Chops)
Add some basic Linux support.
Add a standardized format for game version.
Add a toggle to turn off system notifications after an auto update.
Add a single instance lock so you can only launch the app once.
Fix an issue with game version column appearing blank.
Fix an issue where update all did not visual update.
Fix an issue where 'Up to Date' appeared as a greyed out button.
Fix an issue with downloaded files/folders not being cleaned up.
Fix issues with file operations erroring when perfoming multiple downloads.

Add zoom support shortcuts and ctrl + scrollwheel (by Linaori).
Add version label to the 'Get Addons' page (by Chops).
Updates to the addon detail page (by Flippey).
Russian local updates (by Medok).
Add the system notification for auto updates.
Fix some column spacing.
Telemetry for user actions added.
Fix a bug not allowing users to uninstall an addon with no 'installed folders'.
Hopefully less issues with installing multiple addons at once.
Fix some errors related to addons imported from GitHub.

Update Russian locale.
Try to fix some font blurriness.
Remove debug error in WowInterface provider.

Localize most static text (by Pansa and Medok).
Implemented addon detail view in my-addons (by Flippeey).
Window position/size/maximized state should now be restored when starting the app (by Chops).
Double clicking the titlebar on mac should perform the action set in your system settings (by Chops).
Addon scanning is now much faster.
When scanning addons, the matching channel type should be applied not the default.
Re-scan is now less complicated and should prevent duplicates.
Add the 'Show Folder' button to the addon context menu.
Add http circuit breakers to the providers.
Fix issue with My Addons Provider column not sorting.
Page context data on the footer.
Remove the windows menu bar buttons for mac.
Add WowUp addon provider prototype
